rationales.stimulation: He leaves a predictable senior role because novelty and challenge matter more to him than routine.
rationales.security: He gives up stock-option stability to avoid a known six-month path.

rationales.stimulation: He is energized by new tools, high pace, and steep learning in the startup environment.
rationales.achievement: He studies late into the night to perform quickly in the new role.
rationales.security: He accepts a pay cut despite family cost pressures and hides that risk from his mother.

rationales.achievement: Owning a critical service by day four reflects rapid responsibility and performance.
rationales.stimulation: He values the fast-trust, high-velocity environment versus slower legacy processes.

rationales.achievement: He actively seeks and tracks recognition for output, including preserving praise from leadership.
He accepts a technical speaking slot to build professional credibility and visible accomplishment.
rationales.power: He explicitly wants to be known and recognized as someone who ships valuable work.

rationales.stimulation: He keeps chasing new tools and side ideas rather than staying on a single planned track.
rationales.achievement: He procrastinates a visibility-critical talk deliverable he knows would advance him.
He invests heavily in crafting a strong self-assessment and documenting deliverables.
rationales.power: He acknowledges a strong need for others in authority to notice his work.

rationales.achievement: He successfully executes the meetup demo and handles technical questions well.
rationales.power: External recognition from attendees and his manager is central to why the moment feels significant.

rationales.stimulation: As problems become familiar, he is quickly drawn toward a new domain challenge.
rationales.security: His reflex to look elsewhere destabilizes continuity even in a currently good role.
rationales.achievement: He is still attracted to a major advancement path through tech-lead responsibility.

rationales.stimulation: He describes scanning new opportunities as an almost automatic need.
rationales.security: That recurring restlessness has already imposed repeated family relocation strain.

rationales.stimulation: He identifies a repeated cycle of chasing novelty once roles become routine.
rationales.achievement: He remains motivated by leadership title, equity, and visible trajectory.
rationales.security: He recognizes this cycle repeatedly undermines longer-term personal and family stability.
